peachbox.connector.connector module¶

class peachbox.connector.connector.Connector[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for all connectors

set_param(param)[source]¶

peachbox.connector.pail module¶

class peachbox.connector.pail.Pail[source]¶

Bases: object

Pail for data. Contains data, a model and vertical partition key to determine where to store it.

static create_pails(data, model)[source]¶

Creates a list of pails for given data set and model. The data is partitioned with respect to the partition_key and granularity as defined in the model.

target()[source]¶
